4167.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And indeed,|98|112|640$جَآءَكُمْ|came to you|103|132|838$يُوسُفُ|Yusuf|84|113|8799$مِن قَبْلُ|before|92|121|250$بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ|with clear proofs,|136|165|880$فَمَا|but not|69|83|132$زِلْتُمْ|you ceased|96|102|15146$فِى|in|48|61|89$شَكٍّ|doubt|58|71|4619$مِّمَّا|about what|96|109|216$جَآءَكُم|he brought to you|140|153|838$بِهِۦۖ|[with it],|79|92|204$حَتَّىٰٓ|until|64|77|526$إِذَا|when|55|61|1370$هَلَكَ|he died,|73|80|4695$قُلْتُمْ|you said,|80|94|522$لَن|`Never|66|80|524$يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ|will Allah raise|114|128|15147$مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ|after him|112|126|504$رَسُوۚلاً|a Messenger.`|116|130|1181$كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus,|77|84|702$يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ|Allah lets go astray|148|171|15148$مَنْ|who|50|96|76$هُوَ|[he]|48|94|298$مُسْرِفٌ|(is) a transgressor,|147|193|15135$مُّرْتَابٌ|a doubter.`|97|120|15149$

4168.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|99|20$يُجَـٰدِلُونَ|dispute|101|115|9381$فِىٓ|concerning|92|106|89$ءَايَـٰتِ|(the) Signs|94|108|2041$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|95|2$بِغَيْرِ|without|70|84|612$سُلْطَـٰنٍ|any authority|109|116|6529$أَتَـٰهُمْۖ|(having) come to them,|177|187|5542$كَبُرَ|(it) is greatly|107|127|5547$مَقْتًا|(in) hateful|94|114|14415$عِندَ ٱللَّهِ|near Allah|98|118|891$وَعِندَ|and near|78|98|7426$ٱلَّذِينَ|those|70|80|20$ءَامَنُواْۚ|who believe.|103|112|84$كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|96|702$يَطْبَعُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah sets a seal|128|146|6646$عَلَىٰ|over|63|82|52$كُلِّ|every|57|76|185$قَلْبِ|heart|59|78|15150$مُتَكَبِّرٍ|(of) an arrogant|127|136|15126$جَبَّارٍ|tyrant.`|74|74|8566$

4171.verse: وَقَالَ|And said|76|90|1089$ٱلَّذِىٓ|the one who|103|131|138$ءَامَنَ|believed,|79|107|111$يَـٰقَوْمِ|`O my people!|115|143|513$ٱتَّبِعُونِ|Follow me;|91|119|15157$أَهْدِكُمْ|I will guide you|119|133|15158$سَبِيلَ|(to the) way,|110|350|6800$ٱلرَّشَادِ|the right.|85|325|15141$

4173.verse: مَنْ|Whoever|78|85|76$عَمِلَ|does|66|80|10138$سَيِّئَةً|an evil|65|79|774$فَلَا|then not|77|91|208$يُجْزَىٰٓ|he will be recompensed|174|188|6217$إِلَّا|but|42|56|86$مِثْلَهَاۖ|(the) like thereof;|139|146|6218$وَمَنْ|and whoever|105|114|1012$عَمِلَ|does|66|83|10138$صَـٰلِحًا|righteousness,|116|133|622$مِّن|whether|74|91|53$ذَكَرٍ|male|60|77|3631$أَوْ|or|41|58|154$أُنثَىٰ|female,|68|85|2791$وَهُوَ|while he|74|83|305$مُؤْمِنٌ|(is) a believer,|116|125|4317$فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|then those|92|110|777$يَدْخُلُونَ|will enter|94|112|4491$ٱلْجَنَّةَ|Paradise,|80|98|368$يُرْزَقُونَ|they will be given provision|199|217|3494$فِيهَا|in it|54|63|253$بِغَيْرِ|without|70|330|612$حِسَابٍ|account.|84|344|1852$

4167.verse: And Joseph had already come to you before with clear proofs, but you remained in doubt of that which he brought to you, until when he died, you said, 'Never will Allah send a messenger after him.' Thus does Allah leave astray he who is a transgressor and skeptic."

4168.verse: Those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without an authority having come to them - great is hatred [of them] in the sight of Allah and in the sight of those who have believed. Thus does Allah seal over every heart [belonging to] an arrogant tyrant.

4169.verse: And Pharaoh said, "O Haman, construct for me a tower that I might reach the ways -

4170.verse: The ways into the heavens - so that I may look at the deity of Moses; but indeed, I think he is a liar." And thus was made attractive to Pharaoh the evil of his deed, and he was averted from the [right] way. And the plan of Pharaoh was not except in ruin.

4171.verse: And he who believed said, "O my people, follow me, I will guide you to the way of right conduct.

4172.verse: O my people, this worldly life is only [temporary] enjoyment, and indeed, the Hereafter - that is the home of [permanent] settlement.

4173.verse: Whoever does an evil deed will not be recompensed except by the like thereof; but whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - those will enter Paradise, being given provision therein without account.
